message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $13,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am comfortable with paying $13,200 for the product.
